PRIVACY.HEADER_SUB: I confirm that I am over 16 years old and I have read the information notice provided by the Data Controllers in accordance with local applicable laws, I understand that providing the personal data for profiling and marketing purposes is optional and I:
PRIVACY.GENERAL_CONSENT_NAM: to the transfer of my Personal Data outside of the country to Data Controller as referred in paragraphs 1 and 5 of the information notice
PRIVACY.FLAG_MARKETING_OPTIN_TEXT: to the use of the Personal Data for marketing purposes, dispatch of newsletters, news and promotions, advertising material or direct selling, market research, commercial communication even customized with automated (e-mail, other communication systems via communication networks such as, by way of example but not limited to sms, mms, Whatsapp) and traditional (paper mail) contact methods as well as offering of customized sales services at Data Controllers stores worldwide (even e-commerce).
PRIVACY.FLAG_PROFILING_OPTIN_TEXT: to the use of the Personal Data for profiling purposes, that is analysis of my consumer choices consistent in automated processing of the Personal Data included those Personal Data related to purchases details in stores and websites of Data Controllers worldwide. PRIVACY.HEADER_SUB:
By ticking the relevant boxes below, signing and submitting this form I have read and understood the Privacy Policy of Joyce* (at www.joyce.com) and Privacy Policy of Marni** (at www.marni.com) (the “respective Privacy Policies”) and agree to the following:
Joyce and Marni (collectively the “Data Controllers”) may respectively collect, use and store my personal data (my “Personal Data”) that I provide under this application for provision of services to me, direct marketing, and analysis of my shopping trends and behavior, in strict compliance with their respective Privacy Policies. It is voluntary for me to provide my Personal Data but Joyce and Marni may not be able to provide me with services if I do not provide my Personal Data. My Personal Data will be kept confidential at all times, except that it may be provided on a confidential basis to third parties stated in and in accordance with the respective Privacy Policies (and I have read and acknowledge the list of third parties).

Direct Marketing:
  • (i) The Data Controllers may not use my Personal Data for direct marketing unless they have received my consent.
  • (ii) my Personal Data may be used by the Data Controllers to contact me in relation to news, events and promotional offers with respect to dining, food and beverages, sports, music, film, television and other entertainment, clothing and accessories, jewellery, luggages and bags, cosmetics, personal health and hygiene, electronics, home furnishings, and housewares, automobiles, transport and travel, hotels, financial services, loyalty and reward programs, media services, entertainment services, social networking services, payment services, on-line advertising services, other e-commerce, information and communications and services, concierge services in accordance with the respective Privacy Policies.
Transfer out of my country of residence:
  • (iii) My Personal Data may be transferred outside of my country of residence for the Purposes stated in the respective Privacy Policies, subject to my consent below.
I understand I can opt-out of receiving direct marketing communications, or request for access to and correction/deletion of my Personal Data at any time by clicking the “unsubscribe” link or by contacting the respective Privacy Officer of Joyce and/or Marni at:
- [email] for Joyce or [email] for Marni; or
- [ address] for Joyce or [ address ] for Marni.

*Joyce means Joyce Boutique Holdings Limited, LCJG Limited and its related companies (including its subsidiaries and affiliates).
**Marni means OTB S.p.A., Marni Group Srl and [affiliates].
Please tick the box below if you agree to the use of your personal data for these purposes:
PRIVACY.GENERAL_CONSENT_NAM: I agree to the transfer of my Personal Data outside of my country of residence by Joyce and Marni
PRIVACY.FLAG_MARKETING_OPTIN_TEXT: I agree to the use of my Personal Data for Direct Marketing Purposes by Joyce and Marni
PRIVACY.FLAG_PROFILING_OPTIN_TEXT: I agree to the use of my Personal Data for analysis of my shopping trends and behaviour, by Joyce and Marni
PRIVACY.PRIVACY_LINK: I confirm that I have read Marni's privacy policy.
PRIVACY.PRIVACY_LINK_DCB: I confirm that I have read privacy policy.

PRIVACY.HEADER: Consent to the processing of Personal Data (For data collected in stores)
PRIVACY.HEADER_SUB: I confirm I’m over 16 years old and I have read the Privacy Statement provided by Data Controllers in accordance with local applicable laws.
PRIVACY.GENERAL_CONSENT_NAM: I agree to the collection, use, disclosure or processing of my Personal Data by the Data Controller for the purposes stated in the Privacy Statement.
PRIVACY.FLAG_MARKETING_OPTIN_TEXT: I understand that providing the Personal Data for profiling and marketing purposes is optional and I agree to the use of the Personal Data for marketing purposes, dispatch of newsletters, news and promotions, advertising material or direct selling, market research, commercial communication even customized with automated (e-mail, other communication systems via communication networks such as, by way of example but not limited to SMS, MMS, WhatsApp) and traditional (paper mail) contact methods as well as offering of customized sales services at Data Controllers stores worldwide (even e-commerce). I can unsubscribe by clicking the unsubscribe link on any message, or by contacting.
PRIVACY.FLAG_PROFILING_OPTIN_TEXT: I agree to the use of the Personal Data for profiling purposes, that is analysis of my consumer choices consistent in automated processing of the Personal Data included those Personal Data related to purchases details in stores and websites of Data Controllers worldwide. This processing is finalized to predict my purchase preferences and to create customers profiles.
PRIVACY.HEADER_SUB_3: Consent to be contacted and receive electronic messages
PRIVACY.FOOTER_SUB_1:
You can withdraw your consent at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link in the electronic messages or by contacting the Data Controllers at the following information:
  • OTB S.p.A., with registered offices in Italy, Breganze (Vi), Via dell'Industria 2, 36042, telephone +390445306555, email privacy@otb.net,
  • Marni Group Srl, with registered offices in Italy, Milan, Via Sismondi Gian Carlo 70/B, 20133, telephone +390271055300, email privacy@marni.com.
PRIVACY.FLAG_TEXT_MESSAGE: You consent to us contacting you by phone, SMS, email, and other electronic messages about our products and promotions, including newsletters.

PRIVACY.HEADER_SUB:
메종 마르지엘라와 함께하세요

저희 프리미엄 멤버께는 고객님만의 감각적인 취향을 그대로 표현해 줄 맞춤 서비스가 준비되어 있습니다. 가입하시면 저희 브랜드의 특별한 이벤트, 뉴 컬렉션의 새로운 소식, 가장 좋아하시는 제품의 입고 소식, 또는 알림 및 독점 오퍼 등의 소식을 받아 보실 수 있습니다.
PRIVACY.HEADER_SUB_1: 본인은 16세 이상으로, 메종 마르지엘라 그룹(Maison Margiela Group)과 현지 자회사 및 관련 모회사 OTB Spa가 현지 관련 법제를 준수하여 제공한 안내문을 읽었음을 확인합니다. 본인은 자료수집과 마케팅 목적을 위한 개인정보 제공을 거부할 수 있음을 알고 있으며,
PRIVACY.FLAG_MARKETING_OPTIN_TEXT: 정보고지서 2장의 b항에 명시된 바와 같이 마케팅 활용(뉴스레터, 뉴스 및 프로모션)을 위해 개인정보를 제공하는 것에 동의합니다.
PRIVACY.FLAG_PROFILING_OPTIN_TEXT: 또한, 정보고지서 2장의 c항에 명시된 바와 같이 소비자행동 자료수집을 위해 본인의 개인정보를 활용하는 것에 동의합니다.
PRIVACY.PRIVACY_LINK: I confirm that I have read Margiela’s privacy policy.
PRIVACY.PRIVACY_LINK_DCB: I confirm that I have read privacy policy.

PRIVACY.HEADER_SUB:
Join Maison Margiela

As a privileged member, receive tailor-made attentions responding to your personal profile. You will be entitled to invites to special events, updates on our new collections, notification when your favourite products arrive in store and exclusive offers.
PRIVACY.HEADER_SUB_1: I confirm I am over 16 years old and I have read the information notice provided by Maison Margiela Group, local subsidiary, and relevant parent company OTB Spa in accordance with local applicable laws. I understand that providing the personal data for profiling and marketing purposes is optional and:
PRIVACY.FLAG_MARKETING_OPTIN_TEXT: I agree to the use of the Personal Data for marketing purposes (newsletters, news and promotions), in accordance to letter b. paragraph 2 of the information notice
PRIVACY.FLAG_PROFILING_OPTIN_TEXT: I agree to the use of the Personal Data for profiling purposes of my consumer behaviour, in accordance to letter c. paragraph 2 of the information notice
PRIVACY.PRIVACY_LINK: I confirm that I have read Margiela’s privacy policy.
PRIVACY.PRIVACY_LINK_DCB: I confirm that I have read privacy policy.

PRIVACY.HEADER_SUB:
Join Maison Margiela

As a privileged member, receive tailor-made attentions responding to your personal profile. You will be entitled to invites to special events, updates on our new collections, notification when your favorite products arrive in store and exclusive offers.
PRIVACY.GENERAL_CONSENT_NAM: I confirm I am over 16 years old and I have read the Privacy Statement provided by Maison Margiela Group, local subsidiary and relevant parent company OTB Spa (named below Maison Margiela) in accordance with local applicable laws. By doing so, I also understand that providing the Personal Data for marketing and profiling purposes is optional.
PRIVACY.FLAG_MARKETING_OPTIN_TEXT: I agree to the use of the Personal Data for marketing purposes (email, SMS and other electronic messages), direct selling, market research, commercial communication as well as offering of customized sales services at Maison Margiela stores worldwide. I can unsubscribe by clicking the unsubscribe link on any message or by contacting Maison Margiela as mentioned in the back of this form.
PRIVACY.FLAG_PROFILING_OPTIN_TEXT: I agree to the use of the Personal Data for profiling purposes, that is analysis of my consumer choices included those related to purchases details in Data Controllers stores and websites worldwide. The goal is to personalize my experience by predicting my purchase preferences and creating customers profiles.I can withdraw my consent at any time by contacting Maison Margiela as mentioned in the back of this form.
PRIVACY.PRIVACY_LINK: I confirm that I have read Margiela’s privacy policy.
PRIVACY.PRIVACY_LINK_DCB: I confirm that I have read privacy policy.
